author: Brian Turner
method: Mix the prawns and teriyaki marinade in a bowl. Heat a chargrill pan until hot and cook the prawns for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the prawns have turned pink and are cooked through. To serve, hook the prawns over the edge of the hollowed out-tomato and garnish with the lime half.
ingredients: 3 raw tiger prawns,  100ml teriyaki marinade,  1 tomato, top cut off, flesh scooped out,  Â½ lime, to serve
